jd: From: Shivendra, Synkriom shivendra.singh@synkriom.com Reply to: shivendra.singh@synkriom.com Role - Data engineer || Big Data engineer Location - Location is TX,NY,NJ,DE and OH (any of this Location) Passport is mandatory- JOB DESCRIPTION Candidates should be able toDevelop/upgrade spark Infrastructure scripts (EAC) for blue/green deployment on AWS Dev environment.Develop/Upgrade Jules pipeline to deploy Spark job.Execute jules pipeline and deploy spark job to AWS Dev environment.Execute BLUE / GREEN deployment pipeline using Jules for Spark job.Develop/upgrade AbInitio Infrastructure scripts (EAC) on AWS Dev environment for blue / green deployment.Develop/Upgrade Jules pipeline to deploy AbInitio scripts.Execute jules pipeline and deploy AbInitio scripts to AWS Dev environment.Execute BLUE / GREEN deployment pipeline using for AbInitio scripts.Nice to have Terraform.
